GSD.description:
virtio-blk: Fix memory leak among suspend/resume procedure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.276 by commit 381bde79d11e596002edfd914e6714291826967a. For more details please see the references link.
